attributes.name: TCC Bypass via Mounted APFS Snapshot Access v100.0.0
attributes.description: Identifies the use of the mount_apfs command to mount the entire file system through Apple File System (APFS) snapshots as read-only and with the noowners flag set. This action enables the adversary to access almost any file in the file system, including all user data and files protected by Appleâ€™s privacy framework (TCC).
author: Elastic
attributes.query:
event.category : process and event.type : (start or process_started) and process.name : mount_apfs and
  process.args : (/System/Volumes/Data and noowners)
